titleStmt.title: The Protestant's companion, or, An impartial survey and comparison of the Protestant religion as by law established, with the main doctrines of popery wherein is shewn that popery is contrary to scripture, primitive fathers and councils ... / by a true son of the Protestant Church of England as established by law.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Gilbert Burnet.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
